}]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lalitha</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-23 07:16:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>3fbb191a935ac61094e3f15a7bba1070</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_1383184_charityb_item</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CharityBids" source="x_1383184_charityb">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CharityBids">bcaeeadb9369421094e3f15a7bba1090</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_3fbb191a935ac61094e3f15a7bba1070</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>christy</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-11 11:43:40</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>
